title: Ktima Bellou Restaurant
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An elegant 100% organic restaurant belongs to Ktima Bellou Farm Hotel, but outside visitors are welcome with a prior reservation. Located on the Western Mt. Olympus countryside. Offers Greek mountain cuisine with a menu that changes often due to seasonal ingredients. Vegans will find several choices for starters and at least two main dishes; please inform staff you are vegan.
